text: Ej Muhammad, cun ʙandagoni Man dar ʙorai Man az tu ʙipursand, Man ʙa onho nazdikam va ʙa nidoi kase, ki Manro ʙixonad, cavoʙ mediham. Pas Manro dar on ci ki onhoro farmudaam va az on ci ki onhoro man' namudaam, ito'at kunand. Va ʙa Man imon orand. Bosad, ki rohi oʙodii dinu dunjoasonro darjoʙand
